item.description:
MAY 21 - GRANITE STATE FUTURE AWARENESS CAMPAIGN in MANCHESTER

Please come to a meeting in the home of Dave and Nancy Heinlein 38 Norton Ave in Manchester Tuesday May 21st 7:00 PM for the purpose of making plans to distribute the 2,000 copies of "Granite State Future:The Real Facts" by Tim Carter. Norton Ave runs off of Candia Road Exit 6 I-93 headed West (about a mile in on your right) The goal is to get this reprinted article in booklet format, into the hands of every selectmen and counselor in the state. If you want to help with this project, please contact: Hal Shurtleff at 857-498-1309
item.name: GSF Awareness Campaign
